mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT (p_no, b_no, p_name_ko, p_name_en, p_size, p_model_no, p_release_price, p_category, p_class) values(seq_PRODUCT.nextval, #{b_no}, #{p_name_ko}, #{p_name_en}, #{p_size}, #{p_model_no}, #{p_release_price}, #{p_category}, 'brand' )
mapper.select: select p_no from PRODUCT WHERE rownum = 1 order by p_no desc
